name: Contracts (jjrp)
description:
Fiestart presents: 

In Contracts you control an assassin who has been recruited by The Agency. Acting as the Agency's top killer, finish contracts by taking advantage of your surroundings. In this turn-based puzzle game, being bold might cost you a lot.

As a specialized agent, you must get past guards, dogs, and obstacles by engaging in combat, stealth maneuvering, or causing distractions, in order to traverse a series of rooms in a specified location. Plan out your turns by seeing enemy intents, taking note of items you can pick up and use, and sequencing actions together to get through rooms.

Contracts combines different elements from turn-based, stealth, and puzzle games that provide players with challenging levels that reward trial and error. Our game adopts a simple but stylistic aesthetic approach that puts the focus on refined and striking visuals, with straightforward gameplay elements. 

Most art assets were made by the dev team,  including all UI elements and music tracks , but excluding some sound effects.

Made by Fiestart

Zekai Fan

Shiyu Qu
